document_data.name: Potion of Stormshield
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of stormshield''''' were a sort of damage resistance [[potion]] that existed in the period between the [[Spellplague]] and the [[Second Sundering]].
document_data.Description: The liquid within these potions had a slate gray hue and a smell evocative of ozone.
document_data.Powers: Ingestion of a ''potion of stormshield'' temporarily gave the imbiber's skin a metallic sheen and made them resistant to the next instance of lightning and thunder damage that afflicted them.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''potions of stormshield'' could be found in use by many members of the [[Zhentarim]].<ref>
